content: {"name": "Atlanta Community Food Bank @ Jonesboro", "alternate_name": "", "description": "To make an appointment to get food: Text FOOD to 404-994-3482 or call 478-394-4547.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.acfb.org/get-help/jonesboro/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6805 Tara Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Jonesboro", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30236", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.5682178, "longitude": -84.3724251}, "phones": [{"number": "(478) 394-4547", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
